name: time-teller
title: Time Teller
description: The Time Teller extension uses AI to transcribe human-friendly language into a start and end date and then converts the time frame into different units.
author: ickas

commands.name: index
commands.title: Time Teller
commands.subtitle: Convert time frames to different units
commands.description: From human-friendly language into different units such as milliseconds, seconds, minutes, hours, and days.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
